title: Quarterback Known as ‘AR-15’ Changes Nickname, Citing Mass Shootings
description: Anthony Richardson, a sophomore quarterback and rising star at the University of Florida, asked people to call him “AR” or not use a nickname at all.
dc:creator: Alex Traub
media:description: Florida quarterback Anthony Richardson throwing next to former N.F.L. quarterbacks Eli Manning, center, and Peyton Manning at the Manning Passing Academy on the Nicholls State University campus in Thibodaux, La., in June.
